::: {.content-visible when-format="pdf"}
# *Overview* {-}
:::

::: {.content-visible when-format="html"}
![](img/logo_tm.png "Stan Logo"){width=225 .column-margin .d-none .d-md-block}
:::

This is the reference for the functions defined in the
[Stan math library](https://github.com/stan-dev/math) and available in the
[Stan](https://mc-stan.org/) programming language.

For more information the Stan language and inference engines and how to use Stan
for Bayesian inference, see

- the [**Stan User's Guide**](https://mc-stan.org/docs/stan-users-guide/index.html).
The Stan user's guide provides example models and programming
techniques for coding statistical models in Stan.
It also serves as an example-driven introduction to Bayesian modeling
and inference:

- the [**Stan Reference Manual**](https://mc-stan.org/docs/reference-manual/index.html).
Stan's modeling language is shared across all of its interfaces.
The Stan Language Reference Manual provides a concise definition
of the language syntax for all elements in the language
together with an overview of the inference algorithms and posterior inference tools.



::: {.content-visible when-format="html"}
[Download the pdf version of this manual](https://mc-stan.org/docs/{{< env STAN_DOCS_VERSION_PATH >}}/functions-reference-{{< env STAN_DOCS_VERSION_PATH >}}.pdf).
:::
